Psychological abuses are mans most insidious, disgusting and evil of all behaviors. The residual effect, the collateral damage, can cause a catastrophic perpetuation of suffering and self-torment unlike any other.
There is no greater torture to the human spirit than making another believe they’re unworthy of the things they love.
Man’s ability to rise in defiance of such abuses is one of life’s many miracles.
There are few things that truly bring me to tears in this world. One is having the fortune to actually watch as someone overcomes adversity, when all odds are against them.
The other is being credited, even to the smallest degree, for being part of their reason why.

summary: I am a highly organized, regimented, energetic, customer-focused leader in technology with over 20 years of experience in software development and leadership. A proven ability for successful growth and delivering projects on time and on budget.   I lead both individuals and global teams that deliver high-quality software solutions against aggressive deadlines.  I am professional consultant to E level management as well as individuals.  My effort level and output is unmatched. I create lean and efficient environments that thrive.I am passionate about learning, process, customers, quality, people development and creating a strong team culture. I build great companies from the ground up. It is these attributes that enable me to focus on bringing significant value to any company. Initiatives that have been started from my organization have brought tens of millions of dollars in revenue to our company. I put together an awesome team, a plan and execute quickly and with high quality.I hold a Bachelors of Science degree from University of Wisconsin Madison and did my Masters work in Computer Science and Electrical Engineering at Arizona State University.Author of multiple books and consulting business for over 20+ years.My interests are in neuroscience, cognitive sciences, A.I., genetic programming and process automation.  Modelling of human cognitive processes including computational neuroscience.I am an Ultra-Runner and Endurance-Athlete competing and running in more than 185+ marathons and ultra-marathons in the last 4 years alone.  I am also an Ironman triathlete with extreme focus, energy and drive. As a motivational speaker, I teach mind, body and spirit concepts to help others excel and improve their personal and professional life.  As an author, I mainly write books to help others succeed, whether it be in their careers or in their hobbies. Attitude, self-confidence, discipline, drive and energy are the core concepts by which I live, work and play.
